dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A high-level meeting in Astana, like two neighboring rivers converging, strengthening the flow of cooperation between Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A high-level meeting in Astana, like two neighboring rivers converging, strengthening the flow of cooperation between Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chairman of the Mazhilis of the Parliament of Kazakhstan Yerlan Koshanov and Speaker of the Jogorku Kenesh of the Kyrgyz Republic Nurlanbek Turgunbek uulu held the third meeting of the Interparliamentary Cooperation Council in Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's the third meeting of their Interparliamentary Cooperation Council—Yerlan Koshanov and Nurlanbek Turgunbek uulu really driving that dialogue forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's the third meeting of their Interparliamentary Cooperation Council-Yerlan Koshanov and Nurlanbek Turgunbek uulu really driving that dialogue forward.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chairman of the Mazhilis of the Parliament of Kazakhstan Yerlan Koshanov and Speaker of the Jogorku Kenesh of the Kyrgyz Republic Nurlanbek Turgunbek uulu held the third meeting of the Interparliamentary Cooperation Council in Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they're aiming for a pretty ambitious target here: increasing trade turnover to $3 billion by 2030. That's a huge jump.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they're aiming for a pretty ambitious target here: increasing trade turnover to three dollars billion by twenty thirty. That's a huge jump.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One of the key targets is to increase trade turnover between the two countries to $3 billion by 2030.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mm-hmm, and it's not just talk—they mentioned specific projects, like that Industrial Trade and Logistics Complex on their shared border.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mm-hmm, and it's not just talk-they mentioned specific projects, like that Industrial Trade and Logistics Complex on their shared border.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among the key topics were the continued construction of the Industrial Trade and Logistics Complex on the Kazakhstan"Kyrgyzstan border, increasing the capacity of border checkpoints, simplifying the transit corridor, and the proposed construction of the "Almaty"Issyk-Kul" highway.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, plus simplifying transit corridors and even a proposed highway from Almaty to Issyk-Kul. That's infrastructure with real impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, plus simplifying transit corridors and even a proposed highway from Almaty to Issyk-Kul. That's infrastructure with real impact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among the key topics were the continued construction of the Industrial Trade and Logistics Complex on the Kazakhstan"Kyrgyzstan border, increasing the capacity of border checkpoints, simplifying the transit corridor, and the proposed construction of the "Almaty"Issyk-Kul" highway.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And you know, it's interesting—Turgunbek uulu called 2024 a very productive year, with all these state-level talks filtering down to parliamentary action.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And you know, it's interesting-Turgunbek uulu called twenty twenty four a very productive year, with all these state-level talks filtering down to parliamentary action.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nurlanbek Turgunbek uulu noted that 2024 was a very productive year for Kyrgyz-Kazakh cooperation, with visits and negotiations held at the level of Heads of State, parliaments, and governments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It does feel like there's momentum. He said parliaments represent the people, so this isn't just symbolic—it's about deepening mutual understanding.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It does feel like there's momentum. He said parliaments represent the people, so this isn't just symbolic-it's about deepening mutual understanding.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Parliaments represent the interests of the people, which means that through interparliamentary cooperation, we can not only maintain but also deepen mutual understanding, said the Speaker of the Jogorku Kenesh.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And beyond economics, they're looking at cultural ties too. I mean, the visit included the Jibek Joly TV channel and that Silk Way media project…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And beyond economics, they're looking at cultural ties too. I mean, the visit included the Jibek Joly T V channel and that Silk Way media project...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of the visit, the Speaker of the Jogorku Kenesh visited the national TV channel Jibek Joly and familiarized himself with the international media project Silk Way Central Asia, which broadcasts in six languages across 120 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which broadcasts in six languages across 120 countries—that's some serious soft power outreach.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which broadcasts in six languages across one hundred twenty countries-that's some serious soft power outreach.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of the visit, the Speaker of the Jogorku Kenesh visited the national TV channel Jibek Joly and familiarized himself with the international media project Silk Way Central Asia, which broadcasts in six languages across 120 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they wrapped up with theater—a drama based on Chingiz Aitmatov's work. Really tying culture into diplomacy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they wrapped up with theater-a drama based on Chingiz Aitmatov's work. Really tying culture into diplomacy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To conclude the day, the parliamentary delegations will visit the Kazakh National Musical Drama Theater named after Kalibek Kuanyshbayev, where guests will be presented with a drama based on Chingiz Aitmatov's famous work My poplar in a red scarf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You can tell they're thinking long-term, not just transactional. Environmental protection, tourism, even climate change were on the agenda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You can tell they're thinking long-term, not just transactional. Environmental protection, tourism, even climate change were on the agenda.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The meeting agenda also included issues related to investment cooperation, cultural and humanitarian ties, as well as projects in tourism, environmental protection, and climate change.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It feels like a model for regional partnership, honestly. Not every neighboring pair collaborates this closely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It feels like a model for regional partnership, honestly. Not every neighboring pair collaborates this closely.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. When heads of state set the tone with frequent meetings, it really does trickle down—parliaments follow suit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. When heads of state set the tone with frequent meetings, it really does trickle down-parliaments follow suit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The frequency of bilateral meetings between our leaders directly impacts the pace of interparliamentary contacts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder if other Central Asian nations might take note. This kind of integration could reshape the whole region's dynamics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder if other Central Asian nations might take note. This kind of integration could reshape the whole region's dynamics.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And starting with concrete goals—like that $3 billion trade target—gives everyone something tangible to work toward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And starting with concrete goals-like that three dollars billion trade target-gives everyone something tangible to work toward.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One of the key targets is to increase trade turnover between the two countries to $3 billion by 2030.
